text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Baghdad trade fair opens on Friday with 16 countries and 50 international firms taking part.
- Representatives of Egyptian companies express their readiness to supply Iraq with foodstuffs.
(The above stories were also carried by THAWRA and QADISSIYA)
- U.S. intervention in northern Iraq -- a clear violation of international legitimacy.
